app.description: App to chat via AI chatbot with structured documents like product manuals

api.too-many-requests: Too many requests, please try again later.

app.title: Chat With Manuals

conversation.hallucination-alert: The AI may sometimes produce inaccurate answers, please always refer back to the original document for accurate information.
conversation.language-alert: Please use {locale, select, es {Spanish} en {English} other {Unknown}} in this conversation as the document is indexed in this language.
conversation.language-alert-brief: Conversation language: {locale, select, es {Spanish} en {English} other {Unknown}}

disclaimer-modal.acknowledgment: By using this application, you acknowledge that you are doing so at your own risk. For your safety and privacy, please limit usage to non-sensitive, non-confidential data until the app is fully launched in a secure environment.
disclaimer-modal.thank-you: Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.
disclaimer-modal.title: Application in development

warning-items.data-exposure: Be aware that data within this app may be exposed or accessed publicly.
warning-items.no-sensitive-documents: Do not upload any sensitive or confidential documents.
warning-items.no-sensitive-info: Avoid entering any sensitive information in chat conversations or in any other part of the application.

disclaimer-modal.warning-text: This application is currently in development and is not yet deployed in a secure production environment. It could also contain unexpected bugs and errors that could expose your data to the public. All data processed by this app is not secure.

document-list-picker-modal.description: Select a document to open a new conversation with it.
document-list-picker-modal.no-documents-body: Seems you haven't uploaded any documents yet. Upload your first one to get started!
document-list-picker-modal.title: Pick document

api.internal-server-error: Failed to parse the document, try again.

document-parsing-update.unknown-error: Failed to parse the document, try again.

api.internal-server-error: Failed to receive document parsing updates, refresh the page.

sse-subscription.unknown-error: Failed to receive document parsing updates, refresh the page.

document-manager.no-documents-body: Upload your first document to get started!

conversations.deleteConversationConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete conversation titled: {title} ?
conversations.title: Conversations

update-document-modal.delete-confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this document? This action cannot be undone.

form-errors.image-must-be-valid: Image must be a JPEG, PNG or WebP file.
form-errors.title-max-length: Title must be at most 255 characters long.
form-errors.title-min-length: Title must be at least 3 characters long.

update-document-modal.title: Edit document information

upload-new-document-modal.document-type-value: {type, select, BOARD_GAME_MANUAL {RPG or Board game manual} REPORT {Report or scientific paper} PRODUCT_MANUAL {Product manual} OTHER {Other} other {Other}}

form-errors.document-type-required: Please select a document type, if unsure select 'Other'
form-errors.image-must-be-valid: Image must be a JPEG, PNG or WebP file.
form-errors.title-max-length: Title must be at most 255 characters long.
form-errors.title-min-length: Title must be at least 3 characters long.
